data.name: Rise of the Robots X
data.detailed_description:
[Early-Beta: The game is currently in early-Beta, graphics are being updated]

Rise of the Robots X (RoRx) is an online futuristic card-based strategy game played on a hexagonal grid battleground. Build your army with Robots, Buildings and Masteries to climb the Merit ladder and show other player your Strategist skills with a customized nickname.

Discover the "Round" system. In-between real-time and turn-based, the "Round" system gets the best from both worlds: No waiting time and mind over action!



Play solo in 1v1, or with a team in 2v2 and 3v3. Play with friends. Earn in-game currency at the end of each ranked game to buy new cards. Achieve more than 500 missions. Upgrade your head quarter to earn passive income.

Planned for the release: 92 Robots, 60 Buildings and 60 Masteries. (And more to come each patch)

data.short_description: Rise of the Robots X (RoRx) is an online futuristic card-based strategy game played on a hexagonal grid battleground. Played on a hexagonal grid battleground, each game is an opportunity to refine your army and get better Robots, Buildings or Masteries!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 1GB | AMD Radeon HD 5770 1GB | Intel HD4000 @720p
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 1GB | AMD Radeon HD 5770 1GB | Intel HD4000 @720p
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Nvidia 680MX, 2GB AMD R9 M290, 1.5GB Intel Iris Graphics 540 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14

  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Processor: 3.4GHz Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Nvidia GTX 680 or better, 2GB AMD R9 285 (GCN 3rd Gen) or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
